title: The Night Creepers:
description: The Night Creepers is a short childrens novel concerning the central characters of Sheila, Freddy and Oscar. One day, Sheila has a plan that will require the three of them to venture out to try and escape their boring, everyday routine which leads them into an adventure that they could never have thought possible. The Night Creepers is suitable for children of all ages.
author: James Tingle
